body: 11 days have passed since Egyptian youth decided to revolt on Tuesday, 25th of January. The "Facebook Revolution" has provoked different reactions in the Arab World especially amongst the hopeless and repressed.
original_body: 11 days have passed since Egyptian youth decided to revolt on Tuesday, 25th of January. The "Facebook Revolution" has provoked different reactions in the Arab World especially amongst the hopeless and repressed.
title: Egypt Uprising Restores Some Hope
